author: mprudhom
msg: Added 'openjpa.loglevel' property to build which allows one to control the verbosity of logging via the system property. Also added various profiles for testing different databases (test-derby, test-hsqldb, test-mysql, test-postgresql, test-sqlserver, test-sybase, and test-custom)

author: stevel
msg: I forgot to add an @since tag when this was added.

author: mbo
msg: Change maven remote repositories (maven.repo.remote property) to avoid download errors and Cookie warnings
